Method Detail

streamFile

public static void streamFile(java.net.URL fromLocation,
                              java.lang.String toLocation)
                       throws java.io.IOException
streamFile is called to transfer the file from the specified location to a location on the localhost specified by the client of this program.
Parameters:
fromLocation:Ljava.net.URL - object representing the remote location of the file to transfer
toLocation:Ljava.lang.String - is the specified location on the localhost to place the file.
Throws:
a - Ljava.lang.IOException if the stream is corrupted during the file transfer.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
main is the executable method of this program.
Parameters:
args:[Ljava.lang.String - array containing the arguments to this program. Note: that arg[0] contains the URL of the remote file to transfer and arg[1] contains the destination of the file on the localhost.
